    • isPronunciationRhymesWithOtherPronunciation

      public boolean isPronunciationRhymesWithOtherPronunciation(Set<IPronunciation> pronunciationSetToRhyme, Set<IPronunciation> dictionarySetOfPronunciation)
      Checks if either pronunciation has any pronunciation that rhymes with each other.
      Parameters:
      pronunciationSetToRhyme - is a set of pronunciation from the given word.
      dictionarySetOfPronunciation - is a set of pronunciation from the dictionary word.
      Returns:
      true if either pronunciation sets rhymes with each other, else return false.
